job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: ltstronggtltstronggtltstronggtwhat makes us psyonixltbrgtltstronggtltstronggtltstronggtat the core of epic and psyonixs success are talented passionate people psyonix prides itself on creating a collaborative welcoming and creative environment whether its building awardwinning games or crafting engine technology that enables others to make visually stunning interactive experiences were always innovatingltbrgtltbrgtbeing epic means being a part of a team that continually strives to do right by our community and users were constantly innovating to raise the bar of engine and game developmentltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtwhat you will doltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtwe are looking for a qualified and passionate data scientist to join us on the analytics team you will lead indepth analyses into our raw player behavior data surface actionable insights and opportunities to the organization and work with the team to transform your findings into processes and systems supporting our fundamental goal of making rocket league betterltbrgtltstronggtltstronggt in this role you will ltbrgtltstronggtltstronggtltulgtltligt utilize gameplay data to derive player motivation and behavior and deliver actionable insights ltligtltligt perform indepth analyses across a multitude of data sets types and sources ltligtltligt develop maintain and optimize advanced dataflows and automated processes and assist in their deployment into our infrastructure ltligtltligt propose workable initiatives to analytics marketing and development teams that positively drive kpis while protecting our playerfirst values ltligtltligt liaise and collaborate with other team members and departments on initiatives from inception to execution ltligtltulgtltstronggtltstronggt what were looking for ltbrgtltstronggtltstronggtltulgtltligt years of experience with writing and maintaining sql objects preferably mysql ltligtltligt years of experience interacting with large and complex data sets ltligtltligt advanced understanding and application of various analysis methods ltligtltligt demonstrated experience in architecting new data flows along with the reporting presentation and visualization of resulting data ltligtltligt professional experience with object oriented programming ltligtltligt a passion for diving into data to extract trends signals and insights ltligtltligt experience simultaneously addressing multiple project and stakeholder needs ltligtltligt strong written and verbal communication skills ltligtltligt a veteran rocket league player that understands community desires and tolerances ltligtltligt knowledge of the game industrys inner workings ltligtltligt familiarity with go c r python php linux ltligtltligt working knowledge of cloud computing aws google cloud azure and associated infrastructure ltligtltligt experience creating and working with ml models ltligtltligt experience with tableau or similar data visualization software ltligtltulgtltstronggtltstronggtltstronggtepic job epic benefits epic lifeltbrgtltstronggtltstronggtltstronggtour intent is to cover all things that are medically necessary and improve the quality of life we pay for of the premiums for both you and your dependents we offer coverage for medical dental vision hra long term disability adampampd and life insurance kltbrgtltbrgtall epic employees enjoy drinks snacks and lunches every day free of charge and we offer plenty of annual celebrations for employees and family members to show the love we have for our people additionally each year we celebrate the epic family with companywide paid breaks generous paid time off and recognize individuals for years of employment with a paid sabbatical we think our people are pretty awesomeltbrgtltstronggtltstronggtltstronggtlike what you hear come be a part of something epicltbrgtltstronggtltstronggtltstronggtepic games deeply values diverse teams and an inclusive work culture and we are proud to be an equal opportunity employer learn more about our equal employment opportunity eeo policy here ltbrgtltbrgtepic games deeply values diverse teams and an inclusive work culture
